name: npc_dota_hero_batrider
bio_loc:
There is no such thing as harmony among the creatures of the Yama Raskav Jungle. By bite, or claw, or pincer, or hoof, even the slightest sign of weakness means a swift death. They say the Rider was just a lad cutting chaff in his family's field when he was taken, swept up by a massive morde-bat looking for take-out. But this boy had a better idea, and wriggled his way from his captor's grip, onto the beast's back, and hacked it down with his tools. Emerging from the bloody wreckage and intoxicated by the thrill of flight, the boy realized he'd found his calling.

The boy grew, and every summer he'd return to his family's field, often setting out into the bush seeking to reclaim that first thrill of facing death in the form of jaws or a fatal fall. The years went on, but his fire only grew stronger. He studied the overgrowth, plunging deeper with each expedition, until finally he found his way to the caves at the heart of hostility. They say the Rider, on the eve of a scorching summer night, had nothing but a rope, a bottle of liquid courage and a burning determination to feel the skies once more, when he plunged inside...
hype_loc: Once he takes to the skies, Batrider can strike from any direction. Snatching a foe with his lasso, he soars above the treetops, pulling his prey through a trail of flame as he drags them before his merciless allies.
npe_desc_loc: Can lasso an enemy away from his team

facets.description_loc: Batrider gains Move Speed and Spell Amplification when displacing enemies.
facets.name: batrider_buff_on_displacement

facets.description_loc: Sticky Napalm deals damage to structures.
facets.name: batrider_arsonist

abilities.name: batrider_sticky_napalm
abilities.desc_loc: Drenches an area in sticky oil, amplifying damage from Batrider's attacks and abilities and slowing the movement speed and turn rate of enemies.  Additional casts of Sticky Napalm continue to increase damage, up to %max_stacks% stacks. Applies a small amount of damage with each cast.
abilities.lore_loc: It's not uncommon to hear the Rider cackle while he increases the flammability of his opponents.
notes_loc: All damage from Batrider gets amplified, except for Radiance, Orb of Venom, Urn of Shadows, and Spirit Vessel.
Sticky Napalm does not require turning to cast.
Sticky Napalm deals %creep_damage_pct%%% damage to creeps.
abilities.shard_loc: Every other attack applies +%bonus_applications_every_other_attack% additional stack of Sticky Napalm.
facets_loc: Sticky Napalm deals damage to structures.

abilities.name: batrider_flamebreak
abilities.desc_loc: Hurls an explosive cocktail that explodes when it reaches the target location, knocking back, slowing and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area.
abilities.lore_loc: A molotov cocktail is the weapon of choice for Batrider.
abilities.shard_loc: Causes Flamebreak to have two charges and apply a Sticky Napalm charge on impact.

abilities.name: batrider_firefly
abilities.desc_loc: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider.
abilities.lore_loc: When an enemy escapes into the Yama Raskav Jungle, most would cut through the brush to find the fugitive.  Batrider just chooses to destroy the jungle along with his foes.
notes_loc: During this the Batrider can fly above units, trees and impassable terrain.
If duration ends when above impassable terrain, the Batrider can get stuck.
The trail persists through Batrider's death.

abilities.name: batrider_smoldering_resin
abilities.desc_loc: Batrider's attacks apply a debuff that deals %tick_attack_damage_pct%%% of the attack damage every %tick_rate%s for %total_ticks%s.

abilities.name: batrider_flaming_lasso
abilities.desc_loc: Lassoes an enemy and drags them in Batrider's wake. Dragged units cannot move, attack, or use abilities.  Teleporting or blinking will break the lasso.
abilities.lore_loc: Few dare to ask to ride on the bat, as Batrider gives them free of charge.
notes_loc: Killing the target or the Batrider will break the lasso before its expiration.
If Batrider moves more than 425 units in 0.05 seconds the lasso breaks.
Batrider cannot attack while using Flaming Lasso.
abilities.shard_loc: Flaming Lasso no longer disarms you.
abilities.scepter_loc: Flaming Lasso grabs both its target, as well as the target's nearest allied hero within %grab_radius_scepter% units. The secondary target is tethered to the first.

abilities.name: batrider_stoked
abilities.desc_loc: Batrider gains Move Speed and Spell Amplification when displacing enemies.
notes_loc: After using an ability or item on an enemy hero that applies a forced movement effect, gain bonus movement speed and spell amplification. Does not stack.
